basics.name: Richard Hendricks
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Caution, this whole text is generated by ChatGPT :). I'm a passionate software engineer with a strong background in software development and entrepreneurship. Experienced in building scalable and reliable systems. Committed to continuous learning and innovation. My mother always said I'd make her proud; little did she know it would be by coding, not by becoming a doctor!

work.name: Pied Piper
work.stack: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, SQL
work.summary: Founded and led Pied Piper, a technology startup focused on decentralized internet infrastructure. Developed groundbreaking compression algorithm that revolutionized data storage and transfer.
highlights: Led the team to win TechCrunch Disrupt
Built a culture of innovation and collaboration

work.name: Hooli
work.stack: Java, C++, Cloud Computing, Distributed Systems
work.summary: Internship as a software engineer at Hooli, a leading tech company. Worked on projects related to cloud computing and distributed systems.
highlights: Collaborated with senior engineers on critical projects
Gained hands-on experience with large-scale systems

work.name: Aviato
work.stack: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, SQL
work.summary: Worked as a junior developer at Aviato, a software development firm. Contributed to various projects and gained valuable experience in full-stack development.
highlights: Participated in code reviews and debugging sessions

work.name: Hendricks' House of Pivots
work.summary: Founded Hendricks' House of Pivots, a consultancy specializing in advising startups on how to pivot their business models. Master of pivots, I can turn any failed startup into a unicorn!
highlights: Expert in thinking outside the box

work.name: Bachmanity
work.stack: Broom, Mop, Duct Tape, Fire Extinguisher, Coffee
work.summary: Served as the Chief Technology Janitor at Bachmanity, a startup incubator. Responsible for cleaning up messy code, untangling technical debt, and ensuring our servers didn't catch fire.

projects.name: Middle-Out Compression
projects.description: Developed a revolutionary compression algorithm based on middle-out compression, drastically reducing file sizes without loss of quality. Implemented in Pied Piper platform.
